synopsis.text: The anime follows Aichi Sendou, a young cardfighter who aims to participate in the big Vanguard tournament, the Vanguard Koshien, with his Cardfight Club. However, the club is at risk of being dissolved due to lack of members. Aichi must train his comrades in the game and fight against opposition from the student council in order to save the club and earn the right to compete. The story also focuses on Aichi's personal growth as he reunites with Toshiki Kai, a skilled cardfighter who once gave Aichi the powerful "Blaster Blade" card. With Kai's help, Aichi works to improve his cardfighting abilities while building deeper bonds with his teammates. As Aichi strives towards his goal, he is confronted by inner demons and must make difficult choices about his approach to the game. The anime depicts the characters' passion for Vanguard and highlights themes of friendship, competition, and finding one's path. Full of cardfighting action and personal drama, the series promises an exciting narrative for both longtime fans and newcomers to the Vanguard franchise.
